info.name: Accounts API
info.description: Auto-generated from OpenAPI spec - Pure API routes without tests

request.description: Check if the service is running and healthy
Retrieve a list of all bank accounts
Retrieve detailed information about a specific account
Retrieve the current balance of a specific account
Retrieve transaction history for a specific account with optional filters
Retrieve a computed summary for an account (e.g., current/available balances, recent transaction count, average daily balance, last transaction date)
Retrieve details of a specific transaction
Create a new fund transfer between two accounts
Check the current status of a transfer
